content: the court of appeal in naples has issued a final judgment in a legal case that lasted for 7 years the main appeal was successful resulting in the revocation of an injunction order the respondent incidental appellant has been ordered to pay the main appellant €477201 for lease rents and interest the court also rejected the incidental appeal and compensated onethird of the court costs the respondent is required to reimburse twothirds of the legal costs to the main appellant the court considered the expenses of an expert witness dividing the technical consultation costs equally between the main appellant and the respondent the judgment was based on the civil code and the evidence provided by the parties the court found that the main appellant proved their status as the heir and successor of the lease contract the court also addressed the timeliness and admissibility of the appeals and accepted the main appeal as wellfounded the court partially accepted the grounds raised in the incidental appeal ordering additional compensation for the uninhabitable and unsuitable condition of the leased property the court also considered the lack of adequate written proof of debt in relation to counterclaims the judgment was rendered on september 14 2022 by the court of appeal in naples
